definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: treat with despite, only Ezek. (Aram. [[שׁוּט]], 4uwt.o0 despise; cf. perhaps As. šâṭu, rebel, Meissn);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt., c. acc. pers.: mpl. (subst.) [[הַשָּׁאטִים אוֹתָם]] Ez Eze 28:24, Eze 28:26 (Kö:ii. 1. 108, 346 Ges:§ 72 p); fpl. [[בְּנוֹת פְּלִשְׁתִּים הַשָּׁאטוֹת אוֹתָךְ]] Eze 16:57 (Kö:ib. 189).
